en.tagline: Your Trigonometry Pal ‚Äî learn and calculate fast with visual tools.
en.subtitle: Learn and calculate areas, volumes, and perimeters of geometric figures in seconds. 123Trig is a free, multilingual visual tool ‚Äî ideal for middle and high school students.
en.landing-intro: üîé Select a shape below and enter its dimensions to get instant results. Calculations update automatically in your language.
en.suggestion-banner: üí° Help me get better ‚Äî got feedback?
en.desc-square: A square has four equal sides and right angles. Use it to calculate area and perimeter easily.
en.desc-cube: A cube is a 3D shape with six equal square faces. It lets you compute volume and surface area.
en.desc-rect: A rectangle has opposite sides equal. Quickly find its area and perimeter with two sides.
en.desc-rect-prism: A rectangular prism is a box-shaped 3D object. Use it to find surface area and volume.
en.desc-triangle: A triangle has three sides. With base and height, you can get its area fast.
en.desc-triangle-pyramid: A triangular pyramid has a triangle base and three faces. You can calculate volume easily.
en.desc-circle: A circle is a 2D shape with constant radius. Compute its area and perimeter in one step.
en.desc-sphere: A sphere is a perfectly round 3D shape. Use its radius to get surface area and volume.
en.desc-cylinder: A cylinder has two circular faces and height. Get surface area and volume with simple inputs.
en.desc-cone: A cone has a circular base and tapers to a point. Quickly compute area and volume with radius and height.
en.desc-perimeter: Perimeter is the total length around a shape. It's easy to find for polygons.
en.desc-area: Area is the space inside a 2D shape. Each figure has a specific formula to calculate it.
en.desc-volume: Volume measures how much space a 3D shape takes. It's given in cubic units.
en.desc-surface-area: Surface area is the total area of all faces of a 3D object. Useful in geometry and real-world applications.
en.contact-p1: Have feedback or suggestions? I'd love to hear from you.
en.contact-p2: Use the feedback button at the top to send your message via Google Forms.
en.contact-p3: I read everything, even if I can't always reply. Thanks for helping improve 123Trig.
en.privacy-p1: We do not collect personal data directly.
en.privacy-p2: Google AdSense may use cookies to personalize ads. See Google‚Äôs policy for more info.
en.about-p1: 123Trig is a free visual calculator designed to help students quickly understand and solve geometry problems. It was born out of a personal frustration: I often saw students struggling with formulas that felt more complicated than they needed to be.
en.about-p2: I wanted to create something pragmatic, logical, and simple ‚Äî a clean, fast tool focused on clarity and results, not noise or distractions.
en.about-p3: Want the result? Go for it. Forgot the formula? It's right there. 123Trig was built to remove friction ‚Äî so you can calculate faster, learn visually, and move on.
en.terms-p1: 123Trig is a free educational tool. Use it at your own discretion.
en.terms-p2: While we aim for accuracy, we do not guarantee that all results are free of errors.
en.terms-p3: By using this site, you agree not to use it for unlawful or malicious purposes.
